title: Identify whether the examples below are fragments or sentences. If any of the below is a fragment, can you rewrite it (fix it) to become a complete sentence? Examples bellow this question.  - Quora

response.answer_text: After the doctor examined the broken arm, which was broken in two places.During the baseball game, in the third inning to be exact.We took the short way to get to the store.His ex-girlfriend Samantha, the one he dated five years ago.A mentor from a galaxy 67 light years away.
